assignments.description: The record type needs to be set to recCase so that in the next Screen the filtering of the Picklists are filtered based on the record type.

choices.description: Default choice. Is the Order id defined in the Opportunity.
choices.name: OrderChoice

decisions.description: In ongoing work, the WO is in "New", "In Progress" or "On Hold" status. WO in status "Cannot Complete" means that the Installer has set one or more of the WOLIs to "Cannot Complete" status and a Case has already been created.
decisions.name: Is_this_ongoing_work
decisions.label: Is this ongoing work?

Flow.description:
Creates customer service case from Account.
15.11.2023: Logic to consider ongoing work correctly (the not yet installed work). 8.11.2023: Change to Asset and WOLI naming in the selection list. 7.11.2023: Fix for a logic mistake in determining warranty when Asset is selected and it has Entitlement. 5.10.2023: Allow IM to create warranty work. Allow to create work based on WOLI. 3.10.2023: Logic to fill in the Oppo and Order fields. 27.9.2023: Added logic for Warranty Case. Change from mandatory picture input to warning. 26.6.2023: Fix for Oppo and Order lookups. 16.6.2023: Removed Case Reason from screen input. 1.6.2023: Ability to add pictures to the Case. 31.5.2023: Classification added, Opportunity and Order links added and Warranty confirmation checkbox added. 10.5.2023: Warranty check. 10.5.2023: Fixed the Product --> Configuration Product logic. 3.3.2023: First version. 02.12.2023: Save Active Version as R2
Flow.label: Account - Create Case R2

fields.name: ErrTxt1
fields.fieldText:
Error! Case Record Type could not be found.


Please contact the administrator to correct this.

fields.name: ErrTxt2
fields.fieldText:
Error! Configuration Product related to the Asset could not be found.


Please contact the person responsible for the Asset to correct this.

fields.name: ErrTxt2_0
fields.fieldText:
Error! Opportunity related to the Configuration Product could not be found.


Please contact the person responsible for the Asset to correct this.

fields.name: ErrTxt1_0
fields.fieldText:
Error! The Work Order Line Item could not be found.


Please contact the administrator to correct this.

fields.name: ErrTxt5
fields.fieldText:
Error! Opportunity could not be found.


Please contact the person responsible for the Asset to correct this.

fields.name: Errortext1
fields.fieldText:
Warning!


Later on when closing this Case, picture attachments regarding the issue are required to be added.

fields.name: Warranty_is_invalid
fields.fieldText: Asset is not under warranty
